name: Kings Of Streets
description:
Starting from a homeless person who wakes up at a bus station. All you have is a penny in your pocket and some cash in your bank account.

Go out into the city and work hard to earn your first money. The streets will be your home. However, in order to get the title of “King of the Streets” this will not be enough. Buy houses, cars and business. Participate in public life or continue to wander and beg. You can become a taxi or minibus driver to deliver passengers by earning money. Join one of the organizations to get involved into the life of streets. Army, Cops and FBI to clean up the city from criminals such as Mafia and Terrorists.

"Kings of Streets" is a first-person multiplayer role-playing game that has managed to win the love of thousands of players who want to plunge into the vast world of role-playing games. A non-linear, diverse game play with the possibility of a collective game in group. A lot of cars, tasks, entertainment and much more are waiting for you in this game.

Communicate, evolve, play and enjoy. Today you are a simple player and tomorrow you can become King of the Streets!
